body:
Honestly I feel like most of these doujinshis should have more translations other than Chinese like English especially. Not many authors explore much about "bondage" in terms of different variety of gags, tied up positions etc.

Really looking forward to more of these contents and truth to be told, they are actually great bondage mangas, which I really hope someday one of these doujinshis would have few translations. 

This one is my favourite though.
